p.d: Get to know the men behind the music that has sold over 150 million albums worldwide. This immaculately researched documentary presents the pick of interviews with band members from global archives to get to the truth behind the Genesis story. Stunning live performance footage from both the Gabriel and Collins era showcases the talents of the band, as leading journalists and critics review the band in performance. Featuring highlights from: Silent Sun, Entangled, Ripples, The Lady Lies, Turn It On Again, Afterglow and more...
